name: Happy harvest
description:
Ludum Dare 41 

Theme: Combine 2 Incompatible Genres

This office worker is sick and tired of his boring accounting job, so his uncle told him to visit his old cottage in Happy Harvest Valley.

Now, he's finally ready to chill out and do some casual farming.

Use WADS to move around and move the mouse to control your flashlight. Left mouse toggles the flash light.

Press E to plant/harvest plants
